      MessageIn handleMessage(MessageIn message, int id, java.net.InetAddress to)
      Transform or drop an incoming message

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        MessageOut handleMessage(MessageOut message,
                       int id,
                       java.net.InetAddress to)
        Transform or drop an outgoing message
        Returns:
        null if the message is dropped, or the transformed message to send, which may be just the original message

      • handleMessage

        MessageIn handleMessage(MessageIn message,
                      int id,
                      java.net.InetAddress to)
        Transform or drop an incoming message
        Returns:
        null if the message is dropped, or the transformed message to receive, which may be just the original message
